Buff_FenrirThu_SSR_Level0_Add_balance_St: Increase all attack by 15%. Activate by equipping 3 weapons of different types. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot.
Buff_FenrirThu_SSR_Level0_Start_des: Increase volt ATK by 20% and volt resistance by 40%. Activate by equipping 2 or more volt weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot (does not stack with Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction).
Buff_FenrirThu_SSR_Level0_des:
Volt Resonance: Increase volt ATK by 20% and volt resistance by 40%. Activate by equipping 2 or more volt weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot (does not stack with Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction).
Elemental Balancing: Increase all attack by 15%. Activate by equipping 3 weapons of different types. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot.
Buff_FenrirThu_SSR_Level1_des:
When Su-Paw-Star hits a target and creates a mind, the skill becomes Aural Fever. Dash toward the target and attack rapidly, dealing damage up to 1,542% of ATK, and each hit landed restores HP equal to 100% of ATK. If the last hit lands on the target, gain 2 musical notes. Aural Fever has a 16-second cooldown.
When more than 3 notes are detonated together and the cooldown of Aural Fever is greater than 5 seconds, reset the cooldown of Aural Fever. This effect can only trigger once every 18 seconds.
Buff_FenrirThu_SSR_Level3_des:
While Songworld is active:
For every 45% of max HP lost or when using skills, Aural Fever triggers a Songworld Quake, dealing damage equal to 2,025% of ATK to targets in the Songworld.
For every 99% of max HP lost, gain 1 escape death (block a lethal effect and become immune to damage for a short time) for 45 seconds, stacking up to 2 times.
Buff_FenrirThu_SSR_Level5_des:
Increase the damage multiplier of Musical Notes detonation to 70%, and the DoT after detonation to 2% of max HP every second.
While Songworld is active, Songworld Quake is triggered automatically if it doesn't trigger for 12 seconds while in combat.
Buff_FenrirThu_SSR_Level6_5sDelete_des: Even after switching to other weapons, 6-Star Gleipnir's 30% Crit Rate increase lasts for another 5 seconds.
Buff_FenrirThu_SSR_Level6_des: Increase Crit Rate by 30% while wielding Gleipnir. The Crit Rate increase lasts another 5 seconds after switching to other weapons.
Buff_Imitation_Fenrir_level1_13DamageUP_: Equip 2 weapons of different types to increase final damage by ???%.
Buff_Imitation_Fenrir_level1_18DamageUP_: Equip 3 weapons of different types to increase final damage by ???%.
Buff_Imitation_Fenrir_level1_des: Increase final damage by ???% when equipping 2 weapons of different types. Increase final damage by ???% when equipping 3 weapons of different types.
Buff_Imitation_Fenrir_level2_18DamageUP_: Equip 2 weapons of different types to increase final damage by ???%.
Buff_Imitation_Fenrir_level2_25DamageUP_: Equip 3 weapons of different types to increase final damage by ???%.
Buff_Imitation_Fenrir_level2_des: Increase final damage by ???% when equipping 2 weapons of different types. Increase final damage by ???% when equipping 3 weapons of different types.

Buff_Matrix_SSR46_level1_ThuUP_des: When dealing volt damage, increase final damage by ???% for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
Buff_Matrix_SSR46_level1_des: When dealing volt damage, increase final damage by ???% for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

Buff_Matrix_SSR46_level2_des: When dealing volt damage, increase final damage by ???% for 10 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

Buff_Matrix_SSR46_level3_des: When dealing volt damage, increase final damage by ???% for 10 seconds, stacking up to 7 times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

Buff_Matrix_SSR46_level4_des: When dealing volt damage, increase final damage by ???% for 10 seconds, stacking up to 8 times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
Fenrir_caozuozhinan: Instructions for Gleipnir. Learn how to use the skills for this type of weapon.
GA_FPlayerFenrirChangeSkill_des: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, remove all debuffs from the wielder upon switching to this weapon, charge toward the target and attack, dealing damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???, and place 3 notes on the target. Become immune to damage for 2.6 seconds while the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).
GA_FPlayerFenrirEvade_EvadeAttack_des:
Attack with claws, dealing damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knocking the target down.
Passive: On a hit, Melody detonates all the musical notes on the target, dealing damage equal to number of musical notes Ã— 35% of ATK (doubles if more than 3 notes are detonated, damage is considered a dodge attack). The target becomes intoxicated if more than 2 musical notes are detonated, taking damage equal to 1% of the player's max HP (damage is considered a dodge attack) every second for 16 seconds.
GA_FPlayerFenrirEvade_Evade_des:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area and grants hitstun immunity.
Passive: Fires a Musical Note at the target.
GA_FPlayerFenrirMelee_AirAttackBranch_de:
While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the second to seventh airborne attack to trigger Trailing Note.
Roam through the air and deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? to nearby targets.
GA_FPlayerFenrirMelee_AirAttack_des:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 7 times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???%.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to???% of ATK + ???.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???.
Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to {10}% of ATK + {11}.
Seventh Attack: Deal damage equal to {12}% of ATK + {13}.
GA_FPlayerFenrirMelee_Beidong_des:
Each time a target is hit by a normal attack, there is a 50% chance to place 1 note on the target that lasts 15 seconds, stacking up to 5 notes.
Wolfbite, Menacing Hunt, and Trailing Note have a 100% chance to place 1 note on the target on hit.
Notes can only be placed at least 1 second apart.
GA_FPlayerFenrirMelee_JumpAttack_des:
Tap and hold normal attack while in the air (or tap when a target is selected), or tap normal attack while climbing, jumping backward or using a jetpack to trigger Thick and Fast.
Descend from above, dealing damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? upon landing and suspending nearby targets.
The further away from the ground, the higher the damage, up to 600% of ATK.
Tap normal attack again after landing to trigger Roar.
Roar and gain temporary invincibility, dealing damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? to nearby targets and knocking them back.
GA_FPlayerFenrirMelee_MeleeBranch3_des:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack during the fifth or the sixth normal attack to trigger Menacing Hunt.
Descend from above, gaining temporary invincibility and dealing damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and suspending the target.
GA_FPlayerFenrirMelee_MeleeBranch_des:
While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack during the second to the fifth normal attack to trigger Wolfbite.
Charges forward quickly, dealing damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and knocking the target back.
After triggering Wolfbite, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Upswipe.
Swipes upward, dealing ???% of ATK + ??? and suspending the target.
GA_FPlayerFenrirMelee_Melee_des:
Initiate 7 attacks in a row when on the ground.
The first attack deals damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? plus knockback.
The second attack deals damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? plus knockback.
The third attack deals damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? and launches the target.
The fourth attack deals damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? plus knockback.
The fifth attack deals damage equal to ???% of ATK + ??? plus knockback.
The sixth attack deals damage equal to {10}% of ATK + {11}plus knockback.
The seventh attack deals damage equal to {12}% of ATK + {13} and launches the target.
GA_FPlayerFenrirSkill_Skill_des:
Create a Songworld at the current location, separating the target's body and mind and dealing damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???. The mind exists up to 15 seconds, during which the body is weakened (deals 12% reduced damage to the Wanderer). The mind has HP equal to 30 times of the Wanderer's max HP. When it takes damage from Gleipnir's active attacks (not passive), 100% of the damage is transferred to the body (2% for players), and restores HP equal to 50% of ATK to the Wanderer. When the mind return requirement is met, the mind returns to the body and deals area damage equal to ???% of ATK + ???.
Songworld lasts 30 seconds. When inside, Wanderer takes 8% less damage, and ignores 35% of the target's defense.
Cooldown: 30 seconds.
Mind return requirements: The mind returns to the body when it's defeated, when its duration is up, when a new mind spawns, or when it strays too far from the body.
GE_FenrirEvadeBack_Boom_Level5_continueD: Detonate the musical notes, dealing damage equal to 2% of the attacker's max HP every second for 16 seconds.
GE_FenrirEvadeBack_Boom_continueDamage_d: Detonate the musical notes, dealing damage equal to 1% of the attacker's max HP every second for 16 seconds.
GE_FenrirEvade_Music_des: Musical notes from Gleipnir, last 15 seconds and stack up to 5 times.
GE_Fenrir_GeGeCity_MianSi_des: Block lethal damage once and gain temporary invincibility, stacks up to 3 times and lasts 45 seconds.
GE_Fenrir_GeGeCity_ZengYi_des: Reduce damage taken in Songworld by 8%, and ignore 35% of the target's defense.
GE_Fenrir_Level1_ClearDadadaCD_18s_CD_de: Reset the cooldown of Aural Fever. This effect triggers once every 18 seconds.
GE_Fenrir_YST_DamageDown_des: Reduce damage taken from the body by 12%.
MatrixSuit_SSR24_des1: Increases crit damage by ???%/???%/???%/???%. This effect does not stack. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
MatrixSuit_SSR24_des2: When dealing volt damage, increase final damage by ???% for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5/6/7/8 times. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
Nitai_Fenrir_SSR_des: Unlock Gleipnir to venture in the Tower of Fantasy world as Fenrir, the weapon's Simulacrum.

choose_matrix_SSR24_des: A box containing all types of Fenrir Matrices.
fenrir_thunder_ssr_1: A special device that converts sound waves into attack. When the shackles are shattered, the currents of death become sharp claws that tear everything apart.
matrix_SSR24_1_1: I dream of chocolate. Can I believe that this is real?
matrix_SSR24_2_1: A shackled past, a wandering present.
matrix_SSR24_3_1: Will I ever have a home?
matrix_SSR24_4_1: If there are no more goodbyes, I am alright with being used.
tuijianyizhi01: Provide crit damage to match Gleipnir's R6 crit rate increase, and come with good off-hand slot damage increase.
tuijianyizhi02: When in a volt group, use Tian Lang's matrix to get powerful off-hand slot damage increase.
tuijianyizhi03: When paired with Shadoweave, use Lin's matrix to get off-hand slot damage increase.
tuijianyizhi04: If there are no good matrices, use this one for now.
